trans-unit.source: Provides information about the characteristics for a component, such as its attributes, properties, and events.
trans-unit.target: 提供元件特性的相關資訊，例如其屬性 (attribute)、屬性 (property) 與事件。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework provides two ways to access metadata on a type: the reflection API provided in the <xref:System.Reflection?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace, and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> class.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 提供兩種方式可存取的型別上的中繼資料： 反映應用程式開發介面中提供<xref:System.Reflection?displayProperty=nameWithType>命名空間，而<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>類別。

trans-unit.source: Reflection is a general mechanism available to all types because its foundation is established in the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method of the root <xref:System.Object> class.
trans-unit.target: Reflection 相當適用於所有類型的一般機制，因為其在中建立<xref:System.Object.GetType%2A>方法的根<xref:System.Object>類別。

trans-unit.source: The information it returns for a type is not extensible, in that it cannot be modified after compilation of the target type.
trans-unit.target: 無法修改目標型別進行編譯之後，是無法延伸，它會傳回類型的資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the topics in [Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[反映](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/reflection.md)。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> is an extensible inspection mechanism for components: those classes that implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>是元件的可延伸檢查機制： 那些類別可實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>介面。

trans-unit.source: Unlike reflection, it does not inspect for methods.
trans-unit.target: 不同於反映，它不會檢查的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> can be dynamically extended by several services available through the target component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> 可以由數個服務可透過目標元件的動態擴充<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Site%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows these services.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示這些服務。

trans-unit.source: Service name
trans-unit.target: 服務名稱

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Enables another class, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, to provide extra properties to a component.
trans-unit.target: 讓您在另一個類別，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>，以提供給元件的額外屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enables another object to modify the standard metadata that is exposed by a component.
trans-unit.target: 可讓另一個物件以修改元件所公開的標準中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Enables a class to completely and dynamically specify its own metadata, replacing the standard inspection mechanism of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 可讓類別完全以動態的方式指定自己的中繼資料，取代的標準檢查機制<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>。

trans-unit.source: The extensibility provided by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> allows the design-time representation of a component to differ from its actual run-time representation, which makes <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> useful for building design-time infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 所提供的擴充性<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>可讓不同於它的實際執行階段，表示，可讓元件的設計階段表示<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>適用於建立設計階段基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: All the methods in <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> are `static`.
trans-unit.target: 中的所有方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>是`static`。

trans-unit.source: You cannot create an instance of this class, and this class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 您無法建立這個類別的執行個體，這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: You can set property and event values two different ways: specify them in the component class or change them at design time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定屬性和事件值兩種不同方式： 在元件類別中指定或變更它們在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: Because you can set these values two ways, the overloaded methods of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> take two different types of parameters: a class type or an object instance.
trans-unit.target: 因為您可以設定這些值兩種方式，多載方法的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>採用兩個不同類型的參數： 類別類型或物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you want to access <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> information and you have an instance of the object, use the method that calls for a component.
trans-unit.target: 當您想要存取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>資訊和您擁有之物件的執行個體，請使用元件呼叫的方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the method that calls for the class type only when you do not have an instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用您不需要物件的執行個體時，才會呼叫類別類型的方法。

trans-unit.source: Properties and events are cached by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> for speed.
trans-unit.target: 屬性和事件不會快取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>速度。

trans-unit.source: Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，它們都維持不變的物件存留期。

trans-unit.source: However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object.
trans-unit.target: 不過，擴充性提供者和設計工具可以變更物件上的屬性的集。

trans-unit.source: If this is the case, then the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A> method must be called to update the cache.
trans-unit.target: 如果這種情況，則<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A>必須呼叫方法來更新快取。

trans-unit.source: Adds class-level attributes to the target component.
trans-unit.target: 將類別層級屬性加入目標元件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> objects to add to the component's class.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至元件類別的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds class-level attributes to the target component instance.
trans-unit.target: 將類別層級屬性加入目標元件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> that was used to add the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 用來加入指定屬性的新建立 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes%28System.Object%2CSystem.Attribute%5B%5D%29> method adds class-level attributes to the specified instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes%28System.Object%2CSystem.Attribute%5B%5D%29>方法將類別層級屬性加入至元件的指定執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a common requirement of applications using the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class.
trans-unit.target: 因為這是常見的需求，使用 Visual Studio Windows Form 設計工具和 [屬性] 視窗的應用程式時，這個方法會藉由建立已合併的屬性提供的屬性類型描述提供者提供捷徑存在於類別。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是用來將屬性加入類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: This provider can later be passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29> method when the added attributes are no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者可以稍後傳遞到<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29>方法時不再需要新增的屬性。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> objects to add to the component's class.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至元件類別的 <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 物件陣列。

trans-unit.source: Adds class-level attributes to the target component type.
trans-unit.target: 將類別層級屬性加入目標元件類型。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> that was used to add the specified attributes.
trans-unit.target: 用來加入指定屬性的新建立 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Attribute%5B%5D%29> method adds class-level attributes to the specified type of a component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddAttributes%28System.Type%2CSystem.Attribute%5B%5D%29>方法將類別層級屬性加入至指定類型的元件。

trans-unit.source: Because this is a common requirement of applications using the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer and Properties window, this method provides a shortcut by creating a type description provider that merges the provided attributes with the attributes that already exist on the class.
trans-unit.target: 因為這是常見的需求，使用 Visual Studio Windows Form 設計工具和 [屬性] 視窗的應用程式時，這個方法會藉由建立已合併的屬性提供的屬性類型描述提供者提供捷徑存在於類別。

trans-unit.source: The return value is the type description provider that was used to add the attributes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值是用來將屬性加入類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: This provider can later be passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29> method when the added attributes are no longer needed.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者可以稍後傳遞到<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29>方法時不再需要新增的屬性。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The editor base type to add the editor table for.
trans-unit.target: 要加入編輯器資料表的編輯器基底類型。

trans-unit.source: If a table already exists for this type, this method will do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 如果此類型已經有資料表，這個方法將不會採取任何動作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds an editor table for the given editor base type.
trans-unit.target: 為指定的編輯器基底類型加入編輯器資料表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddEditorTable%2A> method adds an editor table for the given editor base type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddEditorTable%2A>方法加入編輯器資料表指定的編輯器的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: Typically, editors are specified as metadata on a component.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，編輯器會指定為在元件上的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: However, if no metadata for a requested editor base type can be found on the component, the associated <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> will search an editor table for the editor type, if one can be found.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果沒有中繼資料要求的編輯器基底類型就可以找到上相關聯的元件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>將資料表中搜尋編輯器的編輯器類型，如果可以找到其中一個。

trans-unit.source: Once an editor table has been added to a type descriptor, it cannot be removed and is owned by the type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 一旦加入編輯器資料表類型描述元，它無法移除，並擁有的型別描述項。

trans-unit.source: The type descriptor may freely make modifications to this table.
trans-unit.target: 類型描述元可以自由修改這個資料表。

trans-unit.source: The format for an editor table uses data types as keys and editors as values.
trans-unit.target: 編輯器資料表的格式會使用資料類型做為索引鍵和編輯器做為值。

trans-unit.source: The value portion of an entry in the table represents an editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 項目資料表中的值部分表示編輯器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: It can have one of three values.
trans-unit.target: 它可以有三個值之一。

trans-unit.source: If it contains a string, the type descriptor will assume this is a fully qualified name of a type, and then load the type for the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果它包含的字串，這是完整限定的名稱的型別，然後載入型別物件假設的類型描述元。

trans-unit.source: If it contains a type, an instance of this type will be created to obtain an editor.
trans-unit.target: 如果它包含的類型，將建立此類型的執行個體取得編輯器。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the value portion may contain an actual editor instance.
trans-unit.target: 最後，值部分可能會包含實際編輯器執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If the type descriptor resolves an editor to an instance, it will store the instance back into the table for future use.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型描述元解析編輯器執行個體，它會儲存在資料表供未來使用的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds a type description provider to the list of providers for this type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 將類型描述提供者加入這個類型描述元的提供者清單。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Adds a type description provider for a single instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: 加入元件之單一執行個體的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29> method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for a single instance of a component.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29>方法會將類型描述提供者提供輸入元件的單一執行個體的資訊。

trans-unit.source: If a provider is added by this method, the provider's <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A> method will not be called because the instance already exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者會使用這個方法，提供者的加入<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A>將不會呼叫方法，因為執行個體已經存在。

trans-unit.source: This method does not maintain a hard reference to the component, so it does not prevent the component from finalizing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會維護硬式元件，參考，所以它不會阻止元件正在完成。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object.
trans-unit.target: 它是可以加入多個相同的型別或物件的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生這種情況，將會以獨佔方式使用的第一個類型描述提供者遇到提供型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: Since type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried.
trans-unit.target: 由於型別資訊提供者會儲存在堆疊中，加入的最後一個提供者將會第一個查詢。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%2A> methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可讓<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%2A>要使用推入和彈出方法類型描述提供者所需的特定案例。

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%28System.Object%29> method on the `instance` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%28System.Object%29>方法`instance`參數。

trans-unit.source: The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的兩個版本會產生不同的領域的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A> method that takes an <xref:System.Object> parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>採用方法<xref:System.Object>參數會影響指定之元件的單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the other overload, which takes a <xref:System.Type> parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，其他多載，其可接受<xref:System.Type>參數，會影響該類型所描述之元件的所有執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProviderTransparent%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29> method if you need to call from partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProviderTransparent%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29>方法，如果您需要從部分信任程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a type description provider for a component class.
trans-unit.target: 加入元件類別的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29> method adds a type description provider that supplies type information for the specified class, derived classes, and all instances of these types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29>方法會將類型描述提供者提供類型為指定的類別、 衍生的類別，以及這些類型的所有執行個體的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The `type` parameter can be any type, including an interface.
trans-unit.target: `type`參數可以是任何類型，包括介面。

trans-unit.source: For example, to provide custom type and instance information for all components, you would specify `typeof(IComponent)`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要提供自訂型別和所有元件的執行個體資訊，您會指定`typeof(IComponent)`。

trans-unit.source: Passing `typeof(object)` will call the provider to supply type information for all types.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`typeof(object)`會呼叫提供者提供的所有類型的類型資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method does not maintain a hard reference to any object, so it does not prevent objects from finalizing.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會維護硬式參考任何物件，所以它無法防止進行最終處理物件。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to add multiple type description providers for the same type or object.
trans-unit.target: 它是可以加入多個相同的型別或物件的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: If this occurs, the first type description provider encountered that provides type information will be used exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生這種情況，將會以獨佔方式使用的第一個類型描述提供者遇到提供型別資訊。

trans-unit.source: Because type information providers are stored in a stack, the last provider added will be the first one queried.
trans-unit.target: 因為型別資訊提供者會儲存在堆疊中，加入的最後一個提供者會是第一個查詢。

trans-unit.source: This behavior enables the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%2A> methods to be used to push and pop type description providers as required for particular scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 此行為可讓<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveProvider%2A>要使用推入和彈出方法類型描述提供者所需的特定案例。

trans-unit.source: If successful, this method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%28System.Type%29> method on the `type` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功，這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%28System.Type%29>方法`type`參數。

trans-unit.source: The two versions of this method produce results with different scopes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的兩個版本會產生不同的領域的結果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A> method that takes an <xref:System.Object> parameter affects only that single instance of the component specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>採用方法<xref:System.Object>參數會影響指定之元件的單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the other overload, which takes a <xref:System.Type> parameter, affects all instances of the component described by that type.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，其他多載，其可接受<xref:System.Type>參數，會影響該類型所描述之元件的所有執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProviderTransparent%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29> method if you need to call from partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProviderTransparent%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29>方法，如果您需要從部分信任程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the provider for the Component Object Model (COM) type information for the target component.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標元件之元件物件模型 (COM) 類型資訊的提供者。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler" /> instance representing the COM type information provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler" /> 執行個體，代表 COM 類型資訊提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComNativeDescriptorHandler%2A> property and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler> interface are obsolete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComNativeDescriptorHandler%2A>屬性和<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler>介面已經過時。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A> 屬性 (Property)。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the Component Object Model (COM) object represented by the target component.
trans-unit.target: 取得以目標元件表示之元件物件模型 (COM) 物件的類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the COM object represented by this component, or <see langword="null" /> for non-COM objects.
trans-unit.target: 以這個元件表示之 COM 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />；如果不是 COM 物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A> property returns a type that can be passed to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29> method to define a type description provider for COM types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>屬性會傳回可傳遞至型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Type%29>方法，以定義 COM 類型的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A> property and other members in this class replace the functionality in the obsolete <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>屬性與這個類別中的其他成員取代過時的功能<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComNativeDescriptorHandler>介面。

trans-unit.source: To implement a mapping layer between a COM object and <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>, add a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> to handle type <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要實作 COM 物件之間的對應層和<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>，新增<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>處理類型<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.ComObjectType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The primary <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 主要 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The secondary <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 次要 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a primary-secondary association between two objects.
trans-unit.target: 建立兩個物件之間的主要-次要關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A> method creates an association between a primary and a secondary object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A>方法會建立主要和次要物件之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: Once an association is created, a designer or other filtering mechanism can add properties that route to either object into the primary object's property set.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立關聯時，設計工具或其他篩選的機制就可以新增到主要物件的屬性集路由傳送至其中一個物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a property invocation is made against the primary object, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A> method will be called to resolve the actual object instance that is related to its type parameter.
trans-unit.target: 當屬性的引動過程會對主要物件，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A>將呼叫方法，來解決與型別參數的實際物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WeakReference> is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.WeakReference>是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會阻止任一個物件正在完成並回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="primary" /> is equal to <paramref name="secondary" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="primary" /> 等於 <paramref name="secondary" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" /> that specifies the component to associate with the designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />，指定要與設計工具關聯的元件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents the type of designer to create.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，代表要建立的設計工具類型。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the designer associated with the specified component and of the specified type of designer.
trans-unit.target: 建立與指定元件關聯並屬於指定設計工具類型的設計工具執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" /> that is an instance of the designer for the component, or <see langword="null" /> if no designer can be found.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner" />，亦即元件的設計工具執行個體；如果找不到設計工具，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find a valid <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>, it searches up the class hierarchy for a designer.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法找不到有效<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute>，它會搜尋類別階層架構設計工具。

trans-unit.source: If it cannot find a designer in the class hierarchy, it returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到設計工具類別階層架構中，它會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> 服務的服務提供者。

trans-unit.source: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
trans-unit.target: 建立可以代替另一種資料類型的物件。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the substitute data type if an associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> is found; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />，則為替代資料類型的執行個體；否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A> method will search for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider> that is associated with the specified `objectType` data type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateInstance%2A>方法會搜尋<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>聯指定`objectType`資料型別。

trans-unit.source: This method first tries to obtain a type description provider from the `provider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會先嘗試取得的類型描述提供者，從`provider`參數。

trans-unit.source: If this fails, it searches its own internal tables for a provider (these entries were created through previous calls to <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>).
trans-unit.target: 如果失敗，它會搜尋它自己的內部資料表的提供者 (透過先前呼叫所建立這些項目<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>)。

trans-unit.source: If it finds a provider, this method will delegate the creation call to that object.
trans-unit.target: 如果它找到的提供者，這個方法會委派給該物件將建立呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="objectType" /> is <see langword="null" />, or <paramref name="args" /> is <see langword="null" /> when <paramref name="argTypes" /> is not <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="objectType" /> 是 <see langword="null" /> 或 <paramref name="args" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，當 <paramref name="argTypes" /> 不是 <see langword="null" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="argTypes" /> and <paramref name="args" /> have different number of elements.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="argTypes" /> 和 <paramref name="args" /> 的項目數不同。

trans-unit.source: If the derived class does not provide a substitute instance, this method should call the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 如果衍生的類別沒有提供替代的執行個體，這個方法應該呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Required to inspect non-public members of the component.
trans-unit.target: 需要檢查元件的非公用成員。

trans-unit.source: Link demand access required for <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" /> type <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />.
trans-unit.target: 連結 視需要存取所需的<see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag" />類型<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag.MemberAccess" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The primary object of the association.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的主要物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the type associated with the specified primary object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回與指定主要物件相關聯類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the secondary type that has been associated with the primary object if an association exists; otherwise, <paramref name="primary" /> if no specified association exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果關聯存在，則為與主要物件關聯的次要型別執行個體，如果指定的關聯不存在，則為 <paramref name="primary" />。

trans-unit.source: If a previous association has been made for the `type` parameter using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A> method, then the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A> method returns the correct secondary object to invoke for the requested type.
trans-unit.target: 如果先前的關聯對`type`參數使用<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A>方法，然後在<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A>方法會傳回要為要求的型別叫用正確的次要物件。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A> searches for a compatible designer for `type` and returns the designer if one is found.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAssociation%2A>相容設計工具搜尋`type`，如果找到就傳回設計工具。

trans-unit.source: This method never returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法永遠不會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WeakReference> is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not prevent either the primary or secondary object from being finalized and reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.WeakReference>是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會阻止主要或次要物件正在完成並回收進行回收。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of attributes for a component or a type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回元件或類型的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The component for which you want to get attributes.
trans-unit.target: 您要取得屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection" /> containing the attributes for the component.
trans-unit.target: 包含元件屬性的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="component" /> 是 <see langword="null" />，這個方法會傳回空的集合。

trans-unit.source: The attributes returned by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A> method may be dynamically modified from the original component's source listing by extender providers (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>), filter services (<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>), and attribute filters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetAttributes%2A>方法可能會動態修改擴充性提供者所列出的原始元件的來源 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider>)，篩選服務 (<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ITypeDescriptorFilterService>)，和屬性篩選。

trans-unit.source: When you define a custom attribute with <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to `true`, you must override the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: 當您定義自訂屬性與<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`，您必須覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>讓其成為唯一的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If all instances of your attribute are unique, override <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to return the object identity of your attribute.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的屬性的所有執行個體是唯一的覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>來傳回屬性的物件識別。

trans-unit.source: If only some instances of your attribute are unique, return a value from <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> that would return equality in those cases.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有某些屬性的執行個體是唯一的傳回值，以從<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，可在這些情況下傳回是否相等。

trans-unit.source: For example, some attributes have a constructor parameter that acts as a unique key.
trans-unit.target: 例如，某些屬性具有建構函式參數，可做為唯一索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 對於這些屬性會傳回從建構函式參數的值<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns the type identity regardless of the value of the <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>傳回型別身分識別的值為何<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: In order to return multiple instances of an <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> attribute from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection>, your attribute must override the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 為了傳回多個執行個體<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性從<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection>，您的屬性必須覆寫<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this method, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection.Matches%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個方法的範例，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection.Matches%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of attributes for the specified type of component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件類型的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection" /> with the attributes for the type of the component.
trans-unit.target: 具有元件型別屬性的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: If the component is <see langword="null" />, this method returns an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果元件是 <see langword="null" />，這個方法會傳回空的集合。

trans-unit.source: Call this version of this method only when you do not have an instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要物件的執行個體時，才呼叫這個方法的這個版本。

trans-unit.source: For attributes with <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to `true`, the attribute collection removes duplicate instances.
trans-unit.target: 有屬性<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>設`true`，屬性集合中移除重複的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: These are instances in which the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property returns equal values.
trans-unit.target: 這些是在其中執行個體<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會傳回相同的值。

trans-unit.source: When you define a custom attribute with <xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> set to `true`, you must override the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to make it unique.

trans-unit.target: 如果只有某些屬性的執行個體是唯一的傳回值，以從<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，可在這些情況下傳回是否相等。

trans-unit.source: For these attributes, return the value of the constructor parameter from the <xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 對於這些屬性會傳回從建構函式參數的值<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.target: 預設實作<xref:System.Attribute.TypeId%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>傳回型別身分識別的值為何<xref:System.AttributeUsageAttribute.AllowMultiple%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件之類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> for which you want the class name.
trans-unit.target: 需要其類別名稱的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the class for the specified component using the default type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回使用預設類型描述元之指定元件的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the name of the class for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含指定元件的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this method returns the full <xref:System.Type> name for the `component` parameter type.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，這個方法會傳回完整<xref:System.Type>名稱`component`參數類型。

trans-unit.source: For example, the class name for a button is "System.Windows.Forms.Button".
trans-unit.target: 例如，按鈕的類別名稱是"System.Windows.Forms.Button"。

trans-unit.source: If `component` implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>, it can return an alternate name.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor>，它可以傳回的替代名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the overloaded <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetClassName%28System.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29> method with a second parameter of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於多載<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetClassName%28System.Object%2CSystem.Boolean%29>具有第二個參數的方法`false`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含指定元件型別的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the cached custom type descriptor for the specified type to discover the associated class name.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會使用快取的自訂類型描述元指定之類型探索相關聯的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a component or type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回元件或類型之事件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A component to get the events for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events for this component.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個元件事件的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of events that the given `component` parameter instance provides.
trans-unit.target: 擷取的事件集合的指定`component`參數執行個體會提供。

trans-unit.source: This collection can differ from the set of events the class provides.
trans-unit.target: 此集合可以與不同類別提供的事件集。

trans-unit.source: If the `component` parameter is sited, the site can add or remove additional events.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`設置參數、 站台可以新增或移除額外的事件。

trans-unit.source: If `component` is `null`, then an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`是`null`，則會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: For an example of this method, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個方法的範例，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection.Count%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is a cross-process remoted object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 是跨處理序的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a specified type of component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件類型的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events for this component.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個元件事件的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: Call this version of this method only when you do not have an instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要物件的執行個體時，才呼叫這個方法的這個版本。

trans-unit.source: If the `componentType` parameter is `null`, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`componentType`參數是`null`，就會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: A component to get the events for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> that you can use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 型別的陣列，可用來當做篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a specified component using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回指定元件的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events that match the specified attributes for this component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />，具有與這個元件的指定屬性相符的事件。

trans-unit.source: The events for the `component` parameter can differ from the events of a class, because the site can add or remove events if the `component` parameter is sited.
trans-unit.target: 針對事件`component`參數可能會與不同的事件類別，因為站台可以新增或移除事件，如果`component`設置參數。

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` array can have a mix of <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Attribute> objects.
trans-unit.target: `attributes`陣列可以具有多種<xref:System.Type>和<xref:System.Attribute>物件。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is defined by the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 篩選是由下列規則定義：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> is treated as a wildcard; it matches any event that has the <xref:System.Type> in its set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>會被視為萬用字元使用，它會比對有任何事件<xref:System.Type>集中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If an event does not have an <xref:System.Attribute> of the same class, the event is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件沒有<xref:System.Attribute>相同類別的事件不包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is an instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> class, the event must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性的執行個體<xref:System.Attribute>類別事件必須為完全相符，或它不會包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Attribute> instance is specified and it is the default event, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> in the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Attribute>指定執行個體，這是預設事件，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含傳回陣列中<xref:System.Attribute>事件中。

trans-unit.source: If `component` is `null`, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`是`null`，就會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is a cross-process remoted object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 是跨處理序的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: A component to get the events for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consider custom type description information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示考慮自訂型別描述資訊，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a specified component with a custom type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 傳回具有自訂類型描述元之指定元件的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events for this component.
trans-unit.target: 具有這個元件事件的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: This method retrieves a collection of events that the given `component` parameter instance provides.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取事件的集合，指定`component`參數執行個體會提供。

trans-unit.source: This can differ from the set of events the class provides.
trans-unit.target: 這可能不同於類別提供的事件集。

trans-unit.source: If the `component` parameter is sited, the site can add or remove additional events.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`設置參數、 站台可以新增或移除額外的事件。

trans-unit.source: If `component` is `null`, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`是`null`，就會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is a cross-process remoted object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 是跨處理序的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> that you can use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 型別的陣列，可用來當做篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a specified type of component using a specified array of attributes as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回指定元件類型的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events that match the specified attributes for this component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />，具有與這個元件的指定屬性相符的事件。

trans-unit.source: Call this version of this method only when you do not have an instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要物件的執行個體時，才呼叫這個方法的這個版本。

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` parameter array can have a mix of <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Attribute> objects.
trans-unit.target: `attributes`參數陣列可以具有多種<xref:System.Type>和<xref:System.Attribute>物件。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is defined by the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 篩選是由下列規則定義：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> is treated as a wildcard; it matches any event that has the <xref:System.Type> in its set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>會被視為萬用字元使用，它會比對有任何事件<xref:System.Type>集中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If an event does not have an <xref:System.Attribute> of the same class, the event is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果事件沒有<xref:System.Attribute>相同類別的事件不包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is an instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> class, the event must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性的執行個體<xref:System.Attribute>類別事件必須為完全相符，或它不會包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Attribute> instance is specified and it is the default event, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> in the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Attribute>指定執行個體，這是預設事件，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含傳回陣列中<xref:System.Attribute>事件中。

trans-unit.source: If the `componentType` parameter is `null`, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`componentType`參數是`null`，就會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: A component to get the events for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得事件的元件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> to use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 型別的陣列，可用來當做篩選條件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to consider custom type description information; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示考慮自訂型別描述資訊，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of events for a specified component using a specified array of attributes as a filter and using a custom type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件並使用自訂類型描述元，傳回指定元件的事件集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" /> with the events that match the specified attributes for this component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.EventDescriptorCollection" />，具有與這個元件的指定屬性相符的事件。

trans-unit.source: The events for the `component` parameter can differ from the events of a class, because the site can add or remove events if the `component` parameter is sited.
trans-unit.target: 針對事件`component`參數可能會與不同的事件類別，因為站台可以新增或移除事件，如果`component`設置參數。

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` parameter array can have a mix of <xref:System.Type> and <xref:System.Attribute> objects.
trans-unit.target: `attributes`參數陣列可以具有多種<xref:System.Type>和<xref:System.Attribute>物件。

trans-unit.target: 篩選是由下列規則定義：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> is treated as a wildcard; it matches any event that has the <xref:System.Type> in its set of attributes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>會被視為萬用字元使用，它會比對有任何事件<xref:System.Type>集中的屬性。

trans-unit.target: 如果事件沒有<xref:System.Attribute>相同類別的事件不包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is an instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> class, the event must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性的執行個體<xref:System.Attribute>類別事件必須為完全相符，或它不會包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Attribute> instance is specified and it is the default event, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> in the event.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Attribute>指定執行個體，這是預設事件，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含傳回陣列中<xref:System.Attribute>事件中。

trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is a cross-process remoted object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 是跨處理序的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" /> to find the name for.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找名稱的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Component" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the fully qualified name of the component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回元件的完整名稱。

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified name of the specified component, or <see langword="null" /> if the component has no name.
trans-unit.target: 指定元件的完整名稱，或 <see langword="null" /> (如果元件沒有名稱)。

trans-unit.source: In many cases, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetFullComponentName%2A> method will return the same value as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetComponentName%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在許多情況下，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetFullComponentName%2A>方法會傳回相同的值<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetComponentName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: However, if the component resides in a nested container or has other nested semantics, it may return a different fully qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果元件位於巢狀容器，或有其他巢狀的語意，它可能會傳回不同的完整的名稱。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties on a component or type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回元件或類型之屬性的集合。

trans-unit.source: A component to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要為其取得屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties for a specified component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件的屬性集合。

trans-unit.target: 具有指定元件屬性的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: The properties for a component can differ from the properties of a class, because the site can add or remove properties if the component is sited.
trans-unit.target: 元件的屬性可以與不同類別的屬性，因為站台可以新增或移除屬性，如果元件決定位置。

trans-unit.source: If the `component` parameter is `null`, an empty collection is returned.

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Attribute" /> 型別的陣列，可用來當做篩選條件。

trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件，傳回指定元件的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> with the properties that match the specified attributes for the specified component.

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` parameter array is used to filter the array.

trans-unit.source: Filtering is defined by the following rules:

trans-unit.source: If a property does not have an <xref:System.Attribute> of the same class, the property is not included in the returned array.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of properties for a specified component using a specified array of attributes as a filter and using a custom type descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性陣列做為篩選條件並使用自訂類型描述元，傳回指定元件的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" /> with the events that match the specified attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection" />，具有與指定元件的指定屬性相符的事件。

trans-unit.source: The properties for a `component` can differ from the properties of a class, because the site can add or remove properties if the `component` is sited.
trans-unit.target: 屬性`component`可以與不同類別的屬性，因為站台可以新增或移除屬性，如果`component`設置。

trans-unit.source: The `attributes` parameter array is used to filter the array.
trans-unit.target: `attributes`參數陣列用來篩選陣列。

trans-unit.source: Filtering is defined by the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 篩選是由下列規則定義：

trans-unit.source: If a property does not have an <xref:System.Attribute> of the same class, the property is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性沒有<xref:System.Attribute>相同類別的屬性不包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is an instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> class, the property must be an exact match or it is not included in the returned array.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性的執行個體<xref:System.Attribute>類別的屬性必須是完全相符，或它不會包含傳回陣列中。

trans-unit.source: If an <xref:System.Attribute> instance is specified and it is the default property, it is included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the <xref:System.Attribute> in the property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Attribute>指定執行個體和它的預設屬性，即使沒有任何執行個體，它包含傳回陣列中<xref:System.Attribute>屬性中。

trans-unit.source: If `attributes` has a default attribute, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method matches the case when the property does not have the attribute applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果`attributes`具有預設屬性，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>方法符合大小寫，此屬性沒有套用屬性時。

trans-unit.source: If the `component` parameter is `null`, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`component`參數是`null`，就會傳回空集合。

trans-unit.source: The order of the returned collection is not guaranteed to be identical between calls, so always order it before use.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回之集合的順序不保證是相同的呼叫之間，所以一定訂購，才能使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="component" /> is a cross-process remoted object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="component" /> 是跨處理序的遠端物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type description provider for the component or type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回元件或類型的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type description provider for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定元件的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> associated with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 與指定元件相關的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProvider%2A> method will always return a type description provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProvider%2A>方法一律會傳回的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: Even the default <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> implementation is built on a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 即使預設<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>實作根據<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the type description provider for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定類型的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> associated with the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 與指定型別相關的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProvider%2A> method will always return a type description provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProvider%2A>方法一律會傳回的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: Even the default <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> implementation is built on a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 即使預設<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>實作根據<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that can be used to perform reflection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用來執行反映的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that can be used to perform reflection, given an object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用來執行反映的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (已指定物件)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 指定物件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> method is a low-level version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A>方法是低階版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> is typically used to perform standard reflection against an object when no custom type descriptor can be located for it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> 通常用來執行對物件的標準反映，沒有自訂類型描述元可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="instance" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="instance" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that can be used to perform reflection, given a class type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可用來執行反映的 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> (已指定類別型別)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: 指定類別的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> method is a low-level version of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A>方法是低階版本的<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider.GetTypeDescriptor%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> is typically used to perform standard reflection against a class when no custom type descriptor can be located for it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetReflectionType%2A> 通常用來執行標準的反映類別，沒有自訂類型描述元可以找到它。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="type" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="type" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a type that represents a type description provider for all interface types.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表所有介面類型的類型描述提供者的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that represents a custom type description provider for all interface types.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" />，表示所有介面型別的自訂型別描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.InterfaceType%2A> property gets a <xref:System.Type> object that you can pass to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A> methods to define a type description provider for interface types.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.InterfaceType%2A>屬性會取得<xref:System.Type>可以傳遞給物件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%2A>方法來定義介面類型的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: Clears the properties and events from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取清除屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: A component for which the properties or events have changed.
trans-unit.target: 其屬性或事件已變更的元件。

trans-unit.source: Clears the properties and events for the specified component from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取清除指定元件的屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: Properties and events are cached by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> for speed.
trans-unit.target: 屬性和事件不會快取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>速度。

trans-unit.source: Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，它們都維持不變的物件存留期。

trans-unit.source: However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object.
trans-unit.target: 不過，擴充性提供者和設計工具可以變更物件上的屬性的集。

trans-unit.source: If they do, they should call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有的話，它們應該呼叫這個方法，以清除物件的屬性和事件描述項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只能在設計階段使用。

trans-unit.source: It is not used during run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段不使用它。

trans-unit.source: This method also raises a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event when the properties or events of a component change.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會引發<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>事件屬性或事件的元件變更時。

trans-unit.source: This event is only raised if there was a prior call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A> method that cached the information.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有在先前呼叫只會引發這個事件<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>或<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetEvents%2A>快取資訊的方法。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using this method, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用這個方法的範例，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that represents the assembly to refresh.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />，表示要重新整理的組件。

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in this assembly will be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 這個組件中的各個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 都會被重新整理。

trans-unit.source: Clears the properties and events for the specified assembly from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取清除指定組件的屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: Properties and events are cached by <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> for speed.
trans-unit.target: 屬性和事件不會快取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>速度。

trans-unit.source: Typically, they are constant for the lifetime of an object.
trans-unit.target: 通常，它們都維持不變的物件存留期。

trans-unit.source: However, extender providers and designers can change the set of properties on an object.

trans-unit.source: If they do, they can call this method to clear the property and event descriptors of the object.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有的話，它們能呼叫這個方法，以清除物件的屬性和事件描述項。

trans-unit.source: This method is used only at design time.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只能在設計階段使用。

trans-unit.source: It is not used during run time.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段不使用它。

trans-unit.source: Before you make a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A> method to clear the cache, you need to call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A> method for the specific assembly to cache the information first.
trans-unit.target: 之前，請呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refresh%2A>方法，以清除快取中，您需要呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.GetProperties%2A>第一次快取的資訊的特定組件的方法。

trans-unit.source: This method also raises a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event to notify all classes that want to be notified when the property set of a component changes.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會引發<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed>事件以通知所有想要的屬性集元件變更時收到通知的類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" /> that represents the module to refresh.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Module" />，表示要重新整理的模組。

trans-unit.source: Each <see cref="T:System.Type" /> in this module will be refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 這個模組中的各個 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 都會被重新整理。

trans-unit.source: Clears the properties and events for the specified module from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取清除指定模組的屬性和事件。

trans-unit.target: 屬性和事件不會快取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>速度。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the properties and events for the specified type of component from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 從快取清除指定元件類型的屬性和事件。

trans-unit.source: Call this version of this method only when you do not have an instance of the object.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要物件的執行個體時，才呼叫這個方法的這個版本。

trans-unit.target: 屬性和事件不會快取<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>速度。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cache for a component is cleared.
trans-unit.target: 清除元件快取時發生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of using this event, see the <xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需使用此事件的範例，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.RefreshEventHandler>類別。

trans-unit.source: The primary <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 主要 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: The secondary <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 次要 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes an association between two objects.
trans-unit.target: 移除兩個物件之間的關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveAssociation%2A> method removes an association between two objects formed by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveAssociation%2A>方法會移除所形成的兩個物件之間的關聯<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WeakReference> is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not influence when either object is finalized or reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.WeakReference>是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會影響任一物件已完成或記憶體回收所回收時。

trans-unit.source: One or both of the parameters are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 參數的其中之一或兩者都是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: The primary <see cref="T:System.Object" /> in an association.
trans-unit.target: 關聯的主要 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Removes all associations for a primary object.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有主要物件的關聯。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveAssociations%2A> method removes all associations between a primary object and all of its secondary objects, created by calls to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.RemoveAssociations%2A>方法會移除主要物件以及其所有次要物件，呼叫所建立的所有關聯<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.CreateAssociation%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.WeakReference> is used to maintain the association between the primary and secondary object; therefore, this method does not influence when either the primary of secondary objects are finalized or reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.WeakReference>是用來維護主要和次要物件之間的關聯; 因此，這個方法不會影響當完成次要物件的主要或記憶體回收所回收。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="primary" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="primary" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full access to system resources.
trans-unit.target: 系統資源的完整存取權。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated state:
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的狀態：

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously added type description provider.
trans-unit.target: 移除先前加入的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider" />。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the target component.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Removes a previously added type description provider that is associated with the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 移除先前所加入之與指定物件相關聯的類型描述提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method removes a type description provider previously added with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會移除先前新增的類型描述提供者<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.AddProvider%28System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptionProvider%2CSystem.Object%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: Removing a provider causes a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor.Refreshed> event to be raised for the associated object.
